articles.title: ADB lowers India’s growth forecast to 6.3 per cent for FY24, raises inflation forecast - The Economic Times
articles.description: The Asian Development Bank (ADB) has revised India's growth forecast downward to 6.3% from 6.4% due to erratic monsoons impacting agricultural output. ADB also revised its inflation outlook to 5.5% from 5% due to unexpectedly high food prices. However, ADB re…
articles.content: Asian Development Bank, Wednesday, revised Indias growth forecast downward to 6.3% from 6.4% projected earlier, pointing out that erratic monsoons are likely to impact agricultural output.Slowing exp… [+2611 chars]

articles.author: Saurav Mukherjee
articles.title: Mohammed Siraj reclaims Number 1 spot in ICC ODI rankings | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The Indian pacer has climbed eight places after a terrific outing in the Asia Cup after picking up 6 wickets by giving 21 runs in just 7 overs.
articles.content: After a thunderous performance in the Asia Cup Final on 17 September against Sri Lanka, India's pacer Mohammed Siraj has reclaimed the top spot in the ODI bowler rankings ahead of the ICC World Cup. … [+2041 chars]
